section.heading: Independent fiduciary.
section.text: The Chief Financial Officer may enter into a contract with an independent fiduciary to administer the Fund and the CTF Program.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 5 of Child Wealth Building Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-196, Oct. 1, 2021, 68 DCR 011607).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 5 of Child Wealth Building Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-239, Dec. 13, 2021, 68 DCR 013489).
